channel.title: CVE Feed for BdThemes -- Ultimate Store Kit Elementor Addons
channel.description: The latest CVEs for BdThemes -- Ultimate Store Kit Elementor Addons

item.title: CVE-2024-43342|2024-08-28T20:41:39.333Z -- bdthemes -- ultimate%20store%20kit%20elementor%20addons
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in BdThemes Ultimate Store Kit Elementor Addons allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Ultimate Store Kit Elementor Addons: from n/a through 1.6.4.

item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in BdThemes Ultimate Store Kit Elementor Addons.This issue affects Ultimate Store Kit Elementor Addons: from n/a through 1.6.2.
